paragraphs.name: 773d
paragraphs.text: Good visual designs aren’t born. They are made. The key to becoming a better visual designer is rigor. You will only improve as a visual designer if you make a conscious effort.
What are you strategies for improving as a designer? Leave me a note or send me a tweet on Twitter.

dd4dea01d497.title: Experiment with type faces to see what fits your design.

paragraphs.name: 94bf
paragraphs.text: Experiment with type faces to see what fits your design. Also, don’t work in a vacuum. Look at what other sites in similar verticals use in terms of type.
